story.title: Representatives from MLB, MLBPA resume labor talks Thursday at informal NYC meeting - ESPN
story.description:
1. Representatives from MLB, MLBPA resume labor talks Thursday at informal NYC meeting  ESPN
  2. MLB: Season to be shortened if no deal by end of Monday  The Associated Press - en Español
  3. The MLB's season start is canceled as players and owners fail to reach a labor deal  NPR
  4. MLB cancels more games, pushing Opening Day to April 14  CNBC
  5. MLB postpones Opening Day again amid lockout  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
